title: Ending extreme poverty, Ban highlights a sustainable future to the world on the International Day ...
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations ) 16 October 2015 - Ours can be the first generation to witness a world without extreme poverty, where all people - not only the powerful and the privileged - can participate and contribute equally, free of
